entries.title: First Wave
entries.description: We met at a mutual friend's bonfire on Stinson Beach. Sam tried to impress Maria with a surfing story that turned out to be wildly exaggerated. Maria was charmed anyway.

entries.title: Lockdown Love
entries.description: When the world went quiet, we found our rhythm together. Long walks through the fog, cooking experiments (some successful), and endless card games.

entries.title: Adventure Begins
entries.description: Our first big trip together — a road trip up the Northern California coast. We drove through redwoods, ate fish tacos in every town, and knew this was forever.

entries.title: Moving In
entries.description: We found our little place with a view of the fog rolling over the hills. It finally felt like home — messy kitchen and all.

entries.title: The Furry Addition
entries.description: We adopted Biscuit, our golden retriever who loves the beach even more than we do. Our family was growing!

entries.title: The Big Question
entries.description: On a foggy morning hike at Point Reyes, Sam got down on one knee. Maria said yes before Sam could even finish the question. The seals were our witnesses.

entries.title: Tying the Knot!
entries.description: And now we're getting married right where it all started -- on the beach, surrounded by the people we love most.
